snippet: Drug-sniffing dogs, peers watching for people feeling ill, a "cooling tunnel" and shorter days are greeting fans this weekend at an electronic music festival where two people died of drug overdoses last year, organizers said Friday....

headline.print_headline: After Deaths, NYC Music Festival Tightens Security
headline.main: After Deaths, NYC Music Festival Tightens Security

lead_paragraph: Drug-sniffing dogs, peers watching for people feeling ill, a "cooling tunnel" and shorter days are greeting fans this weekend at an electronic music festival where two people died of drug overdoses last year, organizers said Friday.
